summary: This code is creating a shell script named "viewer.sh" which lists the output files and runs "ffplay" on each file in sequence, with a 3-second pause between them. It then executes this script using bash to display the output files sequentially.

details.comment: This code is creating a shell script named "viewer.sh" which lists the output files and runs "ffplay" on each file in sequence, with a 3-second pause between them. It then executes this script using bash to display the output files sequentially.
details.content:
ls -1 output | awk '{print "ffplay -i output/"$1" -autoexit; sleep 3" }' > viewer.sh
bash viewer.sh
